valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Fri 5 Sep 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Sat 6 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low 1006 expected 300 miles west of FitzRoy 997 by 1800 Friday. New high expected southeast Germany 1025 by same time
